info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 3:28PM CDT until April 27 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh.
* WHEN...Until tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding to depths of 1 foot occurs over croplands... pastures... and rural roads along the river. The area affected is entirely rural... and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY
